Body:
"""Test CemTagger removes words in stoplist, including words entirely made up of ignore prefix/suffix.

        GitHub issue #12.
        """
ct = CemTagger()
self.assertEqual([(('benzene-aromatic', 'NN'), 'B-CM')], ct.tag([(
    'benzene-aromatic', 'NN')]))
self.assertEqual([(('-aromatic', 'JJ'), None)], ct.tag([('-aromatic', 'JJ')]))
self.assertEqual([(('non-aromatic', 'JJ'), None)], ct.tag([('non-aromatic',
    'JJ')]))
